text: Jose Offerman was a Major League Baseball player who played for the Boston Red Sox among other teams. == Other websites == *The 100 Greatest Royals of All- Time- #42 Jose Offerman Category:1968 births Category:National League All- Stars Category:American League All-Stars Category:Living people Category:Philadelphia Phillies players Category:Minnesota Twins players Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:New York Mets players Category:Kansas City Royals players Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Seattle Mariners players
title: Jose Offerman
